name: kibbutz
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a farm or factory in Israel where profits and duties are shared and all work is considered equally important: to work on a kibbutz

Add to word list
(in Israel) a place, usually a farm, where a group of people live and work and where all duties are shared
